patthana24.6:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:5.1: Nahetuṃ naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.6:6.1: Nahetuṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:7.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:8.1: Nahetuṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:9.1: Nahetuṃ naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:10.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:11.1: Nahetuṃ nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:11.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.6:12.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:13.1: Nahetuṃ nacittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:13.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.6:14.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
patthana24.6:15.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:16.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:17.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:18.1: Nahetuṃ nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:19.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:20.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:21.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:22.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:23.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:24.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:25.1: Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:26.1: Nahetuṃ naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:27.1: Nahetuṃ nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:28.1: Nahetuṃ naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:28.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.6:29.1: Nahetuṃ nanoupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:30.1: Nahetuṃ naupādinno dhammo hetussa upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.6:30.3: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, āhāre ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.6:31.1: Nahetuṃ naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:31.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, sahajāte nissaye kamme … pe … magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
